```{r}
library(lme4)
library(party)
```


```{r}
d = read.csv("../data/E12_Anon.csv", stringsAsFactors = T)
ct = ctree(Score ~ ., data=d)
plot(ct)

plot(ct2)
d$Score.scaled = scale(d$Score)
d$Score.p = d$Score + 1
```


```{r}
ggplot(d,aes(y=Confidence,x=RevGender)) + geom_violin()
```


```{r}
m0 = glmer(Score.p ~  (1|Auth) + (1|Reviewer), data = d, family=poisson)
m1 = glmer(Score.p ~ Confidence + (1|Auth) + (1|Reviewer), data = d, family=poisson)
m2 = glmer(Score.p ~ Confidence + FirstAuthGender + (1|Auth) + (1|Reviewer), data = d, family=poisson)
m3 = glmer(Score.p ~ Confidence + FirstAuthGender + RevGender +  (1|Auth) + (1|Reviewer), data = d, family=poisson)
```

```{r}
anova(m0,m1,m2,m3)
```

```{r}
sjp.lmer(m1,'pred','Confidence')
```
